dcterms:description: A collection of 30 procedurally generated first-person 3D environments, each posing different goals such as collecting fruit, playing laser tag, or traversing a maze.
dcterms:title: Deepmind Lab 30

dcterms:creator: M. Chevalier-Boisvert
L. Willems
S. Pal
dcterms:description: A minimalistic gridworld environment designed for reinforcement learning tasks, inspired by the T-Maze.
dcterms:title: Minigrid

dcterms:creator: M. Chevalier-Boisvert
dcterms:description: A set of first-person 3D environments that share similarities with the tasks introduced by Minigrid.
dcterms:title: Miniworld

dcterms:creator: M. Wydmuch
M. Kempka
W. Jaśkowski
dcterms:description: First-person shooter 3D environments that revolve around motor-control navigation tasks, with challenges posed by computer-controlled enemies.
dcterms:title: VizDoom

dcterms:creator: M. Fortunato
M. Tan
R. Faulkner
S. Hansen
A. Puigdomènech Badia
G. Buttimore
C. Deck
J. Z. Leibo
C. Blundell
dcterms:description: A suite of diverse memory-based environments designed to evaluate the generalization capabilities of reinforcement learners.
dcterms:title: The Memory Task Suite

dcterms:creator: K. Cobbe
C. Hesse
J. Hilton
J. Schulman
dcterms:description: A collection of 16 procedurally generated 2D environments that offer a combination of puzzle-solving, platforming, and action-based games.
dcterms:title: Procgen

dcterms:creator: E. Parisotto
H. F. Song
J. W. Rae
R. Pascanu
C. Gülcehre
S. M. Jayakumar
M. Jaderberg
R. Lopez Kaufman
A. Clark
S. Noury
M. M. Botvinick
N. Heess
R. Salakhutdinov
dcterms:description: A task requiring the agent to accurately press a series of keys in a specific sequence of fixed length, using a trial-and-error approach.
dcterms:title: Numpad

dcterms:creator: E. Parisotto
dcterms:description: A memory task that shares similarities with the Morris Water maze, where the agent must find an apple and relocate it after random repositioning.
dcterms:title: Memory Maze (1)

dcterms:creator: A. K. Lampinen
S. C. Y. Chan
A. Banino
F. Hill
dcterms:description: A task where the agent must identify a specific dance from a sequence of up to 8 dances displayed visually.
dcterms:title: Dancing the Ballet

dcterms:creator: S. Morad
dcterms:description: A benchmark with 15 environments designed for rapid convergence, classified as diagnostic, control, noisy, game, or navigation.
dcterms:title: PopGym

dcterms:creator: J. Paˇsukonis
T. P. Lillicrap
D. Hafner
dcterms:description: A task showcasing procedurally generated 3D mazes where agents must locate specific objects.
dcterms:title: Memory Maze (2)
